reference: Triffin, Robert (1960), Gold and the Dollar Crisis, New Haven: Yale University Press.
Shultz, George and Kenneth Dam (1977), Economic Policy Beyond the Headlines, Chicago: University of Chicago Press.
Roosa, Robert (1967), The Dollar and World Liquidity, New York: Random House.
Meltzer, Allan H. (1991), U.S. Policy in the Bretton Woods Era, Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis Review 73 (May/June), pp.54-83.

Meltzer, Allan H. (1966), The Regulation of Bank Payments Abroad, Another Failure for the Governments Balance of Payments Program, in George P. Shultz and Robert Z. Aliber (eds), Guidelines, Informal Controls, and the Market Place, Chicago: University of Chicago Press, pp.183-208.
Ohkawa, Kazushi and Henry Rosovsky (1973), Japanese Economic Growth, Stanford: Stanford University Press.
Gowa, Joanne S. (1983), Closing the Gold Window, Ithaca: Cornell University Press.

Garber, Peter (1993), The Collapse of the Bretton Woods Fixed Exchange Rate System, in Michael Bordo and Barry Eichengreen (eds), A Retrospective on the Bretton Woods System: Lessons for International Monetary Reform, Chicago: University of Chicago Press, pp.461-494.
Eichengreen, Barry (2004), Chinese Currency Controversies, Asian Economic Papers (forthcoming).
Dooley, Michael, David Folkerts-Landau and Peter Garber (2002), An Essay on the Revived Bretton Woods System, NBER Working Paper no. 9971 (September).

Bordo, Michael and Barry Eichengreen (1998), Implications of the Great Depression for the Development of the International Monetary System, in Michael Bordo, Claudia Goldin and Eugene White (eds), The Defining Moment: The Great Depression and the American Economy in the Twentieth Century, Chicago: University of Chicago Press, pp.402-453.

Block, Fred L. (1977), The Origins of International Economic Disorder: A Study of United States International Monetary Policy from World War II to the Present, Berkeley: University of California Press.
Barro, Robert (1979), Money and the Price Level under the International Gold Standard, Economic Journal 89, pp.13-33.

Kindleberger, Charles P. (1965), Balance of Payments Deficits and the International Market for Liquidity, Princeton Essays in International Finance no. 46, International Finance Section Department of Economics, Princeton University.
Eichengreen, Barry (1996b), Globalizing Capital: A History of the International Monetary System, Princeton: Princeton University Press.
